text: Tschierv used to be a municipality of the district of Inn in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2009 the municipalities of Tschierv, Fuldera, Lü, Müstair, Santa Maria Val Müstair and Valchava joined and became the new municipality of Val Müstair. Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden
title: Tschierv
